alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; Eastern Lincoln County; Espanola Valley; Estancia Valley; Santa Fe Metro Area; South Central Highlands; Tusas Mountains Including Chama; Upper Rio Grande Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 31 at 11:39AM MDT until March 31 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West to northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Lincoln County, Estancia Valley, South Central Highlands, Espanola Valley, Santa Fe Metro Area, Tusas Mountains Including Chama, Upper Rio Grande Valley, and Chaves County Plains. * WHEN...Until 7 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Chaves County Plains; Eastern Lincoln County; Espanola Valley; Estancia Valley; Santa Fe Metro Area; South Central Highlands; Tusas Mountains Including Chama; Upper Rio Grande Valley
